text: The Email workflow requires marketing hub pro doesnt it?

I don’t really understand the reason why HubSpot do this. If we can get text content by API why can’t we get image content?
Correct

Hi there :wave: I have a question on the CRM API

Is it possible to request associations on the search endpoints? (example *`POST /crm/v3/objects/deals/search`* )
On the list endpoints it is available as an `associations`  query param (example *`GET /crm/v3/objects/deals`*. For our usecase we need both filtering and associations, so using the list endpoints is not an option :disappointed:

docs: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/deals>
<@UFBNA9K9A> is this something you could help me out with? Is this a bug, did I do something wrong or did I simply misunderstand the docs and isn't it a feature?

Have you checked the API docs? This is a good place to start - <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/working-with-oauth>

Hello i would like to find the documentation to develop an integration which use the call module directly inside HubSpot with the call button on the HubSpot Contact. Thanks for your help.

have you looked at the schema to see if the naming is correct for that association?
`<https://api.hubapi.com/crm/v3/schemas/p86417_custom_object_test?hapikey={{key}}>`

Hey Anderson, there isn't an API / set of endpoints to do this. This particular integration that you're looking at is using a Chrome extension to place an icon in the HubSpot UI. It's not really a supported thing to do.
